metadata.title: CVE-2019-12528 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.10. It allows a crafted FTP server to trigger disclosure of sensitive information from heap memory, such as information associated with other users' sessions or non-Squid processes.

criterions.comment: squid package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9-2ubuntu4').
